game.name: The Lost Experiment
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound
game.shortDescription: It is 1997. Farhad, an investigative journalist, arrives at an abandoned military base to uncover the truth behind a silenced 1986 meteor crash. But as he delves deeper into the forest, he finds that the debris isn't the only thing buried here. Some headlines are better left unwritten.
